website_summaries.verdict: An effective and affordable mole and skin tag remover that earns more praise than complaints for the results it provides.
pros: Generates enthusiasm from customers for how simple it is to use and how effective it is at removing most moles and skin tags
Comes with a soothing gel that promotes healing after you've applied the treatment
cons: Contains chemicals that can be painful, and may cause mild to moderate burns
too much product can burn healthy surrounding skin

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! Only 1 two minute application and it immediately died. I am completely satisfied. I am waiting for the scab to come off and it will be gone. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda dorsey

customer_reviews.title: Removes skin tags
customer_reviews.text: This product does work..It removed my skin tags and a mole...You have to be very careful when using because it does burn, but if you use the thhin sticks included and only touch the skin tag the results will be fine..Then use the skin repair lotion after the tag falls off which will help with healing..The seller also sent additional information in the mail after purchase to make sure the product results were done in a healthy manner.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Derych

customer_reviews.title: Worked fast on skin tag
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a skin tag and it was so easy to use and worked fast. I followed the instructions and used the toothpicks that came with the kit to apply a very small amount to the tag, it kind of stung for a second so I knew it was working. By time I wiped away 2 minutes later with dry paper towel the tag was already turning black. Not sure what is in this but it works fast. After turning black it fell off a couple days later with no scaring.
customer_reviews.author: Craig from Maine

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it says it does!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works! Only home remedy that has. I had a skin tag under my arm and I hated it. Dermatologist wanted to charge me $300 to remove. Covered it with a light coat and wiped it off 3 minutes later. A few days later it looked just like the pic. Took about 10 days to fall off but it is off and painless! Using the lotion to cower the scar, but it’s under my arm so I am not too concerned.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme Terrigno

customer_reviews.title: Worth the time worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Pretty straight forward on use and what to expect. I have a lot of tag moles and I’m hitting one by one. I would recommend this product! Just follow the directions.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Fast working
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed at this product. It started working to remove the skin tag after the first application. I would like to say that I have tried several skin tag remover without any results. I have even tried the electronic remover which didn't work for me. This product is easy to use and I love the fact that after two or three minutes you wipe it off. I would definitely recommend this product and would purchase it again. I also love the fact that you apply it with toothpicks, which are a very fine point to work it.
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE OF THE BURN
customer_reviews.text: PLEASE BEWARE!! This will burn the crap out of your skin if you get it anywhere but the skin tag. Unfortunately I didn't read the reviews and warnings before using it. DO NOT LET this stuff touch your SKIN. Only use a minuscule amount on the tip of the skin tag. There was no dropper in mine so I used a Q-tip to apply it and allowed it to touch the skin around the tag and I got burned. I mean with puss and infection. It will work and remove the tag but for now, I have to doctor the burns and heal the wound.
customer_reviews.author: TLS

customer_reviews.title: If you have moles you hate, this will rid you of them!
customer_reviews.text: I was super skeptical when I bought this product. I had a mole on my chest my daughter loved to pick at. I figured I'd give it a shot before going to a dermatologist because frankly, I don't want to spend a bunch of time and money on a mole. My mole was pretty big and almost like a huge black skin tag. Well, a week and a half after use it fell off leaving just a little pink mark! I'm very very pleased with this mole remover! Worked on both my huge mole and some flat ones too!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pickett

customer_reviews.title: It hurts, but it works!
customer_reviews.text: I've become frustrated because dermatologists will no longer remove spots unless they are "suspicious". I decided to try this product based on the reviews and the price. So far, I've removed 2 skin tags, 1 "age spot", and 3 moles. Some spots, especially raised ones and skin tags, will take at least 2 treatments, if not more. Be warned, it does hurt. Poking with a toothpick is not a pleasant experience, and the burning afterwards can last for several hours. I can't really comment yet on the healing and whether any residual spots remain, but I'd rather have those than the ugly spots I've been removing. I would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: alumoffsu

customer_reviews.title: This product worked perfectly well and fast for me.
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use. Needs to carefully follow instructions. I highly recommend it. I wish I saw it before now when I had many skin tags. My skin tag fell off after 3days.😃😃😃
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Best skin tag/ mole remover
customer_reviews.text: I had this one big mole right above my mouth and this was never attractive. I tried other treatment to remove it but that was not successful. It just gave me a lot of pain, so I was hesitant to try this one, but my friend removed her big mole with this product, I decided to try. In about 2 week this big mole that bothered me for so long has gone!!! What a different world and I look totally different.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! It performs exactly as described by the seller. I tested the product out on one small mole in a non-conspicuous location to make sure I wouldn’t have a bad reaction, and everything went perfectly! It looked exactly like each of the stages pictured in the product info, which helped me understand and follow-along with the healing process. The bottles are tiiiiny, but you only need a teensy bit per mole, so one bottle will be more than enough for my own moles as well as my boyfriend’s. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: BriBri123

customer_reviews.title: This works
customer_reviews.text: I was a little scared to use this at first, YOU HAVE TO FOLLOW THE DIRECTIONS! I used this on a spot on my nose, the first time I was scared and barely put any on and it didn't work. The second time, I put the smallest amount using the toothpicks they provided in the packaging and the thing on my nose turned black, it was pretty big and it scabbed and took about 3 weeks to fall off, it did leave a little crater in my nose, but I have started using the repair cream and I can already see the skin starting to grow back. This stuff works!
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Bye bye skin tag/mole/etc hello scar!
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, it works but what they don't tell you is that you will be left with a horrible scar!!!! I had 2 skin tags that were too small to tie off so I bought this......well now I have lovely holes and scars.
customer_reviews.author: CAH

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work for me. I know every body is different and not every product you try will work for your body type. I tried it once and waited 20 days. No scabbing or anything in the first 1-3 days like it says. So I tried it again and still nothing.
customer_reviews.author: James Mills

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever!! Just use a tiny bit of it
customer_reviews.text: This item works great! Just be careful. Use a tiny bit. I used a toothpick that I had on my kitchen, instead of one of those that comes with the product, and it was too much. It's very potent. Moles fell off about 2 minutes, literally, after I put a tiny amount of this item. Do not leave it where curious kids could reach it.
customer_reviews.author: VanesaSmilie

customer_reviews.title: Beware. Do not use this product! Unless you want a hole in your skin
customer_reviews.text: This product is very dangerous. It will eat a hole in your skin and is very painful. Instructions were followed and resulted in a literal hole in the skin. I’d recommend using the natural vinegar mole removal process instead. Much less painful and invasive.
customer_reviews.author: Diana L. Vo

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.text: To apply this product you only need a toothpick which ensures better accuracy when applying. Easy to use and there is enough to last a very long time. Much more cost effective than having the dermatologist perform the procedure and it only takes a couple of minutes.
customer_reviews.author: DRKee

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The 5 star reviews convinced me to try - as I was actually looking to buy another skin tag remover. The product worked great. Took took off one tag immediately and is now in the process of forming a scab. The other I need to redo - not sure I applied product correctly. But will redo and I am sure it will work. Follow instructions carefully - overall happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: Sissy Girl

customer_reviews.title: It’s gone!
customer_reviews.text: Skins tags gone! A larger skin tag needed 2 applications, but I am so pleased! The product burns a little for a few minutes after application. Be careful to only get it on the tag or mole. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: The ZooKeeper

customer_reviews.title: Burned & scarred
customer_reviews.text: I will start by saying I may have possibly used a smidge more than recommended, but I also did not expect this product to burn a relatively deep hole into my skin. It took about 2-3 weeks to heal and also left scarring on the skin as well. That's one way to get the skin tags off...
customer_reviews.author: Brandon west

customer_reviews.title: did not work
customer_reviews.text: it came in two bottles. the bottle that held the lotion looked used. didn't come with an opened safety cap. the main product did not work so I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works, took about 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: It took 2 weeks and two applications to remove a larger skin tag from my jawline. It did work as promised, though I had my doubts during the waiting process. I used a very small amount and applied it only on the skin tag with the supplied toothpick. It burns, but nothing horrible. Definitely cheaper and easier than a trip to the dermatologist. I will probably use it again - it comes with plenty of product in the small jar - but would not use it on my face because it is so potent and the healing process takes so long (and frankly looks gross).
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Works!! Fast and Effective
customer_reviews.text: I've found that products like this normally don't work but this one does what it's claims. Not just on skin tags but also on regular moles. I had a huge raised mole an inch in diameter. I followed the directions and within a week the mole scabbed up and fell off. Still using the recovery lotion but the redness is gone and it's healing very well. I agree with other reviewers that you MUST follow directions or you will burn the skin around your mole or skin tag. Also works on raised warts too. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Easy removal
customer_reviews.text: Have removed 2 skin tags on my neck. Uncomfortable at first but pain subsides shortly. Very happy with results.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Well done. Exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic. I was going to go to a dermatologist to have a mole removed, but did a little research and came across this. The mole is somewhat large, but I applied the remover a week ago and it has completely scabbed and should fall off within another week or so. The directions on the box are somewhat small, but everything you need to know is in these reviews. I wish I had known about this before---it works exactly as advertised and at a very low cost. Five Stars.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph O'Bryan

customer_reviews.title: It's no joke!
customer_reviews.text: I used this on 4 skin tags and it removed all of them. A little goes a long way...read the instructions! They are tucked in-between the inside lining and the outer package. It does burn/sting slightly but only for the last 30-45 seconds. Dedicate 2 weeks for it to heal up and maybe another week or two to be fully healed. This is a more aggressive form of removal but it does work.
customer_reviews.author: とも

customer_reviews.title: YES, it works!
customer_reviews.text: Very grateful for this product, it WORKED for me. 1) I had a flat dark mole on the top of my nose that I did not like. I applied this product and in a week it was gone, it scarred for a while and now my confidence has boosted. 2) I also applied on a skin tag and it turned hard and fell. MIRACLE.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: It’s a winner!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely works. Make sure to follow the exact directions. Do a test run on only one to see how you respond to it. You don’t need much at all. I had a few around my eyes and neck. Yes I shouldn’t have put it around my eyes. So I don’t recommend doing it by but I was desperate. Especially with covid. The tags goes away with 2-3 days for small moles. And the bottle amount..... I can’t see me running out of it for a very long time(Years).
customer_reviews.author: Ro Todd

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This works amazingly! My husband has skin tags under his arm and they fell off after a few days! Very little stinging when first applied then no pain afterwards. One we didn’t get enough product on so had to put more on a few days later. It was a bigger skin tag. Doesn’t take much product. They immediately turn black. He had several little ones also and they didn’t even leave a red mark after falling off, only the bigger ones.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Thomas

customer_reviews.title: It works but sting
customer_reviews.text: I had to write this even tho I never write reviews....it stung so don’t get on surrounding skin but THIS SH!T WORKS. I stuck the toothpick inside the tag 2 nights in a row. 3rd it was gon but area bleeding but no pain. Less is more I learned the 2nd night.
customer_reviews.author: Healthylady

customer_reviews.title: An at home option for mole removal!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised the product worked. But it really does. I don't get skin tags but I have moles I want removed. I have been using this for about 2 months now and am very happy with results so far. I have used the remover on 2 large misshapen moles on my lower abdomen. The larger one has taken 2 rounds to remove but the process is so easy and effective. I am just happy I don't have to see a dermatologist for mole removal. Just make sure you follow directions exactly so you don't have healthy skin burned by the chemical. It works. Plain and simple. I am about to start on more moles.
customer_reviews.author: VGCarollo

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings...
customer_reviews.text: I have such mixed feelings about it. I’ve used it 3 times now on the SAME mole. The first time it lightened slightly, second time nothing happened AT ALL, third time it has scabbed up and looks like my skin is burnt. Idk if it’s bad for it to look this way, but I’m concerned... The picture shows what it looks like now. It stung for a few minutes after wiping it off as instructed, and now an hour later that’s what it looks like. I’m hoping to update this in a week
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Removes skin tags!
customer_reviews.text: If you put a lot of the product on the skin tag, it will burn like a "muther", so be careful only to apply the product to the skin tag, not getting any overflow onto the skin surrounding it. Also, the tag will turn black and the skin may be swollen around the tag once it starts working. It takes a long time for the tag scab to disappear. You only want to use the product once on the tag. The healing process takes a long time. Keep putting the healing lotion on the scab. have patience!
customer_reviews.author: cassmacme

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous product
customer_reviews.text: It’s too strong and very burned, hurt my skin even used as direction with toothpick. Now my skin have a couple of holes(seems to be burned and damaged) and seem to be damaged from this dangerous product. Really regret to buy and use this product to myself. Will return it. Can’t recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Skin Tags
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Be sure and don't get it on your skin because it burns. Worked within a day or two depending on the skin tags. Also used it on a small mole.
customer_reviews.author: Sondra P.

customer_reviews.title: This product will leave an indent in your skin & will scar you
customer_reviews.text: Do not get this product. This will scar you. I tried this and it left a huge indent on my face. Im so disappointed with how this product ruined my face. Now I have to buy scar creams and everything to bring the skin back into that indent. This product will ruin your skin. Please do not get this. The manufacturer seems to focus solely on the removal process, and I think that's where they get you. Sure, I'd like for it to be removed, but what about after? after it's removed, this is what happens.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: Ariella Mole and Skin Tag Remover and Repair Lotion works as described. I was able to get rid of couple of my skin tags. For the first one I followed instructions as described and it was gone in 6 days. For the second tag, I was a bit casual and kept the tag removed cream for around 6 mins instead of 2 mins as recommended, and my skin started burning like hell. I cleared it out and tag was gone within 3 days, but I think it will have a permanent scar :| Overall, I would recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Chintamani Bagwe

customer_reviews.title: Follow the Instructions to the letter!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Follow the instructions on this product to the letter. Use only the toothpick to apply the product. This product will burn your skin if you put the product on wrong. Use only the head of the Toothpick to put the product on. Older skin will burn more quickly and more deeply if this product is applied wrong. I have no comment on the repair lotion because I'm still using Neosporin since putting on the product on November 15th. I did not use the product wrong I just did to many skin tags at one time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: removes
customer_reviews.text: product removes, depending on the size. I had to reapply to an armpit skin tag, the biggest of my entire body, a week later because it hadnt disintegrated fully to fall off. It is not black and im sure it will fall off. the first one i did on my neck, i still have a small dark dot on my skin that i assume will eventually go away in the coming months. another slightly med size tag between hairline and eye, i still have a small stump as an end result, that too i may have to reapply in the near future. Pretty good product, im still using at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Malo

customer_reviews.title: Really does work!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why it took me so long to discover and try this out. I was a bit skeptical and have several skin tags and also some moles that I felt could go. I was VERY careful to follow the instructions. You want to make sure you do not get this on your skin, so take your time. There's also a very slight sting, but it only lasts a few minutes. It's all worth it bc several days later your skin tag with just disappear. I did not have issues with scaring and only used the healing solution a couple times. Would def use this product again!
customer_reviews.author: SMLeo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, but follow the directions!
customer_reviews.text: This product really WORKS!! I’ve tried others that did literally nothing. Effectively removed many skin tags with great results. PLEASE READ THE DIRECTIONS!! The first one I did, I used way too much and burnt the skin around it. Totally my fault as I didn’t follow the clear directions. Use a very small amount, it’s all you need! Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This works really well!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product after doing a lot of research and reading reviews of several products. It seemed to be the best and was priced so well. As others stated, follow the instructions. You only need a little bit of the product. I shared it with two family members and we each tries a couple of skin tag spots to see how it would go. It worked perfectly! So we let the process happen (it took about a week, one or two only took a few days), and they healed well. We each did a few more after those healed and they are in process. The best part, you can easily apply in the comfort of your own home.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Troyan

customer_reviews.title: Tiny bit at a time
customer_reviews.text: The product worked as indicated. Make sure to take it slow. Its not going to work overnight! A little bit goes a long way. I literally put just the tip of toothpick amount twice daily. FOLLOW instructions and you will not get hurt. Also, I read many reviews that people got burnt on their faces. In my opinion, just don't use anything that contains acid on your face. It has worked for twice on my ear and twice on my stomach. I will be applying it on my back next.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful stuff.  Be careful when using, but really works.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if this would be effective. I actually used it on an ugly skintag (mole maybe?) on my eyebrow area. I taped all around it, so I wouldn't get any of the chemical on my skin. It turned black after a day or so and then eventually fell off. It took time to heal, and there's still a slightly noticeable pink scar there. Maybe that will go away eventually, but it looks a hundred times better than before. If you are a young model or super worried about your appearance, you don't want to use it on your face, I think. The product is a super strong acid of some kind. Be careful with it.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Schosek

customer_reviews.title: Skin tag removal
customer_reviews.text: I've had a skin tag I've struggled with for most my life, nothing has ever seemed to remove it completely. I did two treatments back to back with this stuff and it turned black instantly. I'm very impressed, so glad I found this product. It does hurt slightly but not unbearable.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Olson

customer_reviews.title: Love the results!
customer_reviews.text: Used product to successfully remove 8 skin tags from the neck area. LOVE the results! No more irritation from necklaces, seat belt, and clothing. Product works just like it is described.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This product is phenomenal. I was skeptical at the beginning but it is easy to use and economical alternative to dermatologist. Make sure you apply the solution to cover the entire surface of the skin tag or mole. I had to repeat again after first application since my skin tag was medium size. It is very similar to liquid nitrogen cryotherapy. It burns and is painful a bit right after the application. Avoid normal skin area.
customer_reviews.author: paul20051

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I was initially skeptical about this product but it worked great on my husband's skin tag. We are going to try it on a mole next. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This works really well for mole removal. For the smaller, flatter moles, it worked after only one or two applications. For the more raised, larger moles, it takes a few tries, but it definitely does the job. As other users have stated, it does burn and it will get red, but it goes away shortly after. A scab will be there for about two weeks and then it falls off for smooth flat skin. So happy I decided to give this a try!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with the product and results.
customer_reviews.text: My spouse treated 2 skin tags with success and we treated 20+ skin tags/moles I had. The application process is very easy to follow. We found the initial treatment was successful in some instances, while a few moles required a second treatment 4-5 days following the initial application. We’ve been impressed with the results of this product and cost savings compared to a dermatologist surgically removing the skin tags and moles we treated. I’d recommend this product to others desiring to remove unwanted skin tags and/or moles. The caveat being you’ve seen a dermatologist to know the moles you’re considering removing are benign.
customer_reviews.author: Rob T.

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised!!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a surprise!!!! It really works. I was a bit skeptical but I read the reviews and decided to try it. I’m so glad I did. I have many skin tags and so I tried one at a time. This solution is very powerful so I only applied a tiny bit to the tag as per directions and everyone’s reviews and it worked. DO NOT put more than instructed because it will burn.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good and works but be cautious
customer_reviews.text: The product is actually pretty good, but you has to be very careful and follow instructions because this is acid and one little mistake can burn your skin so bad, it took me around 5 days to removed the little tiny ones with the bigger ones I had to applied twice and I still have one that it's the same but as I said you need to be very careful so I applied a tiny amount over them that's maybe the reason why took more time and applications but so far so good product not like the patches or some other natural stuffs you can find here with a lot of fake reviews
customer_reviews.author: alma linares

customer_reviews.title: It's working!
customer_reviews.text: I had tried a different product previously and used it for 2months (2 times/day) and it did nothing! Then I decided to order this and WOW!! I've already had one skin tag fall off (in about 5 days). There is a sting when you used the product but you can see it working. Just read the instructions thoroughly and remember that you don't have to use a lot. A very small dot goes a very long way! I'd recommend this to anyone who wants to save the money from going to the dermatologist.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works
customer_reviews.text: This product was easy to use. Apply directly to the mole, covering the entire mole. There will be slight burning or discomfort as the product works to remove the mole. The whole process took just under 14 days from start to finish. The mole fell off within 5-7 days of applying the product. The other time was used to healing the spot where the mole was. Just apply some of the cream to the area where the mole was and it will heal faster.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Permanent lifelong scar or completely ineffective...there is no in between
customer_reviews.text: Tried this on 2 skin tags that I’ve had for a while. I applied the product as directed 3 separate times following the directions and have noticed no change at all. After the third time I returned it for a refund. Looking through other 1 Star reviews, I am thankful my problem was that it just didn’t work vs leaving my body permanently scarred. This product should not be sold to the public. Very dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: emily finnerud

customer_reviews.title: Follow the instructions closely for the desired outcome.
customer_reviews.text: The product was fantastic. It removed tags and moles that I had for years on my face. It does what it says. I had just a little burn/tingle feeling but it didn't hurt just a sensation. Follow the directions on the packaging and you will be okay, no need to be nervous about the product. It may create a small divot, however mine looked deeper and then just after a couple of weeks it is barely noticed. I expect after some more time it will completely vanish.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Be careful.
customer_reviews.text: Be very careful. It is way too easy to burn your skin. It's been over a week and my skin tags are slowly falling apart, buy skin burned around them looks terrible. Just follow instructions. I probably used too much. Once you put the remover let the skin tag dry out for couple of days. Don't use the repair gel or anything else, nothing that would moisture the spot. Let it dry out. After it falls down you can start using the repair gel.
customer_reviews.author: ewa

customer_reviews.title: This product really works
customer_reviews.text: I had a couple of skin tags and I wanted to try this to remove them. I started with 1to see what would happen. You get 2 bottles in your order,1 is the remover and 1 is a moisturizer. You apply the remover with a toothpick. You only need a small amount. You leave ot on for 2 minutes and then wipe it off. You do get a slight burning sensation for a few days but not enough that it is bothersome. After a few days the skin tag dried up and fell off. I then did my second one and it worked just like the first time. Very satisfied with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Mark McGaughey

customer_reviews.title: This product really works!
customer_reviews.text: I used only a tiny amount of this product the first time and within a day or 2 that part of the skin tag fell off! I waited a few days and put more product on what was left of the skin tag and although it felt like I was getting stung or bitten it only lasted a few seconds. Again within just a few days the rest of the skin tag fell off leaving just a small mark. I am very impressed. This product worked very well and very quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon H

customer_reviews.title: Potentially dangerous product that doesn't do much
customer_reviews.text: After 3 weeks I'd say it left light scaring that I'm not too bothered by because I already have acne scars that make it blend in, but my moles are still there. I didn't use that much either and it left some nasty scabs, I honestly probably used like 2% of the stuff out of 100%. They should probably give you 10% of the acid they send you since you don't even need that much. It may work for others, but not me. Not worth the risks I'd say. It got rid of a black doted acne scar, but that's it. Leaves small pit on applied area after scab removed, soooooo... not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Timmy

customer_reviews.title: The photos speak for themselves!
customer_reviews.text: The product works! However, proceed with caution and read the directions carefully while applying the solution/ointment as it is pretty much acid burning off the mole. Through my experience it had a stinging sensation as it sat on the moles, and was irritated a day or two after from what I can remember. It took a week and a half for the 2 moles on the left side to fall off, and a little over 2 weeks for the right one to fall off. The single mole on the right side was slightly bigger than the 2 on the left, so it took a little longer to fall off. Either way I am satisfied with the results!
customer_reviews.author: Griffin Anders Tsabetsaye

customer_reviews.title: Im glad i purchased it
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of such product since it was my first time trying it, im glad i did. It removed the the skin tag that was on my neck and also one near my armpit now its starting to heal just fine. Since i tried it on myself i also showed a couple of my family members and they agreed to try it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: WOW- Great Product
customer_reviews.text: WOW- I had some skin tags and moles that are unsightly and bothered me. I have lived with them for years. I put this product on and 2 weeks later they are all gone. My skin is already healing very nicely. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Jody K Wallace

customer_reviews.title: First review ever in Amazon because it is worth it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Two years ago, a tag appeared just above my eyelid. It got bigger and triggers Self-consciousness'. I went to different dermatologist but to no avail. When i found his product and helpful reviews, i tried it and i am so grateful i did. It worked like magic. First time application, i kind of put a little Bit too much . My eye was swollen for 3 days so stopped it. After swelling has gone down, i applied some more but just the tip of the skin tag. On the 4th application . Tag dried up. I was able to peel it off. Now it totally gone . I see some redness around it but It is slowly going away..😍
customer_reviews.author: jing

customer_reviews.title: Effective so far
customer_reviews.text: I started by using this to (hopefully) remove a skin tag in my arm pit. First off, let me say this stings/burns. It’s not insurmountable but it isn’t like a mosquito bite. After two weeks the skin tag is noticeably smaller and even if it doesn’t fall off completely (which let’s be honest, I hope it will) it’s so much easier to shave without fear of cutting myself. I will be trying it on another spot soon.
customer_reviews.author: Lora

customer_reviews.title: Not sure still....
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if I did something wrong or what. I followed the directions, as best as they were written, but I had no changes. My skin itched and burned a little for a couple hours, but there were no changes to the skin tags. I fully intend to try again, but am hesitant. I am leaving 3 start because I believe the product has potential, but I'm not sure at this point. I think the directions need to be a bit more clear as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Would have liked to try it.
customer_reviews.text: I could not use the skin tag remover because it was hard as a rock. The lid was not screwed on tight and it must have dried out.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: The bottle I received in May 2020 looked settled. I stirred the product with the wooden pick provided. The second time I used the product in October 2020 the product again was settled, but this time also half the bottle was dried out. Additionally, as instructed I only used the product on one skin tag. The skin tag was not fully removed. The second application did not remove it either.
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: It took multiple uses but IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: I've had a mole on my arm for my entire life. A few years ago it felt like the moles were growing and I gre more worried about them. I've struggled about having access to affordable healthcare and never went to a doctor to get the moles checked. This product makes me feel at ease since it's working for well. I will have to repeat the process a few times until the mole is completely removed, but the "pain" is barely noticeable and the skin heals rather quickly. The size and directions are through so if you had multiple moles or needed to use it more than 10 times (that's an exaggeration) on the same spot it's possible.
customer_reviews.author: Taieja

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: This product really works! Follow the directions carefully....it is very strong so you don’t want to get it on anything other than the skin tag or mole you are wanting to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Skin Care Treatment!
customer_reviews.text: I like how the mole remover cream does what the instructions says it will do. I am so thankful to God and the company that created this product! I used this skin care product on some moles that were on my face, and the scabs/moles came off between 2 to 3 weeks. My skin was clear when the scabs fell off, and the cooling repair lotion/gel is a bonus to treating the newly healed skin. Just simply follow the instructions, have patience, let the dry scabs fall off naturally, and you will be well-pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I love the product
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe it how this product works great , please don’t be scared because the moles get bigger after the application, but next day is completely dry and takes about 5 to 8 days to fall , but really works, but away please be ready for small pain or burning feeling, but just for few seconds
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Navarrete

customer_reviews.title: Removed all 17 skin tags
customer_reviews.text: Removed all 17 of my skin tags. Is a little painful, but worth it. I would be careful of getting it on surrounding skin or using it on a place you don't want scarring. The skin tags all turned black and fell off within a week. I would use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jason at home

customer_reviews.title: Great product, and works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I initially didn't use the product correctly. I think this was of my own fault. After careful review of the instructions, I got a better result.I would definitely recommend the use of this product to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Chad A. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product WORKS! Take the time to carefully read the instructions and follow them word for word! I tested on a small skin tag and a mole. 12 hours later, I wake up. The tag is gone and the mole is half the size. After a few days, the mole shrank to about 3/4 its initial size. I have had these for as long as I can remember. Will continue to use!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff D.

customer_reviews.title: Follow directions accurately for really good result!
customer_reviews.text: This product REALLY DOES WORK! I had a mole on my forearm that was always irritated by my sleeves when I wore short sleeves. The pictures other people posted are what made me want to try this. I will say FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTIONS CAREFULLY. Works like a charm! The mark left behind is still healing, but I am so grateful to no longer have that mole there. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We'll see
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the lotion to use today (new), the outer part of container was very crusty & dried up looking. It does not look like a lotion, it is thicker than that. Still I followed directions & I'll see next week if it works. My skin tag has changed a dark color several hours after application, like directions said it would, so I'm hopeful it'll work.
customer_reviews.author: A reader

customer_reviews.title: Yes it burns, but to new skin!!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried if it would have side effects. Luckily as mentioned it worked immediately on the tag. On applying itself i was able to see the tag burning and coming out. Healing also started to happen within 4days. I was concerned if it would leave a scar.. slowly the scar is haeling to normal skin. Attached before and after pics. Left side shows 90percent healed scar.
customer_reviews.author: tulip

customer_reviews.title: Worked well on a big skin tag
customer_reviews.text: My skin tag was super long. My pics are before during and after photos and they really don’t do justice. There was hardly any pain. I did put a bandaid on it to stop rubbing since mine was on my inner leg. It is currently scabbed and I’m using the cream to heal it. Worked for me. Hopefully scarring will be minimal. I’m glad for the huge skin tag to be gone after years of nothing working!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Works, worth the money, lasts and lasts
customer_reviews.text: Works very well! I've used it on multiple areas so far, while the smaller skin tags and moles are easy to remove, larger ones do take a couple applications. There is plenty in the bottle to do multiple applications. No worries about running out anytime soon! I will say it does slightly burn but nothing unbearable at all! Very happy with my purchase 😊
customer_reviews.author: Goldie M Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Just tried once
customer_reviews.text: We have only used once and was very careful after reading reviews to not use much at all, but I don’t think we used enough as it only turned the top part of one skin tag darker and didn’t fall off. But again, I’m confident this product works as we just didn’t use enough. I’ll update once we try it again. That’s why I gave a 5 star is because it was all on me and not the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Cottingham

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I had a mole just below the tip of my chi that I hated. I applied the smallest amount just on the mole and it darkened same day. It was a dark scab for about a week or so. Now gone! It does burn a little but not bad when applying. Just happy mole is gone with doctor appointments
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Don't overdo it on the amount you out on.
customer_reviews.text: I have always had two skin tags on either side of my neck and finally decided to get ride of them. This worked so well. My smaller dark tag dried up in a few days and fell off quick. My larger skin tag got a bit inflamed and sore but that was probably cause I put to much of the cream on. I put a bandaid over it to prevent rubbing and it dried up just after the 7 day mark and fell off after another 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Ditzy bleues

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Worked like it said. No pain and a few days later it’s all gone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Better than Expected
customer_reviews.text: I have a few larger skin tags that were annoying and unsightly. I purchased this product based on the reviews but was still skeptical that it would deliver as promised. I followed the directions and didn't think I would see results with the small amount of product I applied, but it did indeed fall off and scab up within the week. The attached photo is from after the scab fell off but before I have used the repair lotion. I am very happy with the results!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Bartels

customer_reviews.title: Totally works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for two skin tags around my eye. I was nervous to try it anywhere on my face so I tested it on a tag near my knee. It worked!!! Came off in 4 days! Amazing! I then got brave and did the two tags on my face. It worked!!! No scars! Omg one of these I have had for 2 years. Wish i got this years ago. I am going to try it next on a mole that has been bugging me. Cannot wait! It does take a steady hand and must read directions about not using too much. Anyone that gave this product a negative review didn't read directions.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ellsworth

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have say I have tried other skin tags remover that did not do anything. This stuff actually works as advertised. Be careful to read instructions and do not apply to much.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A Grimes

customer_reviews.title: Best product for skin tags!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked how it felt like it started working immediately at application. The downside was that it burned during application and for a few minutes afterward. All the more reason I think it is working and probably only one application will be needed. These pesky skin tags always get caught in my necklaces, and I wanted a permanent solution without paying hundreds of dollars to a dermatologist. This product will work!
customer_reviews.author: ALD

customer_reviews.title: Be careful!
customer_reviews.text: Please be careful when using this product. It is super potent. I got 3rd degree burns even after I used it following the instructions. The first pic was of my skin tag I wanted to remove and the other 2 was 2 minutes after applying the product it had burned my skin. The pain and burning sensation were horrible. I had to use aloe Vera afterwards because it kept burning after I cleaned it with a wash cloth. Now I’m going to be left with major burn scars. Please be careful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does work
customer_reviews.text: Used this on a very large mole I’ve had for years, plus a couple smaller, newer ones. It took two applications on the large mole, just one on the smaller ones. The moles are gone, the large one still has a red mark, but looks so much better and I continue to use the follow up oil. It does burn, my bottle was quite thick, not sure if it should of been like that or not..
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: This worked as advertised! I read reviews and followed others suggestions by only putting a small amount on. I did feel a burning sensation but nothing drastic or unbearable. My skin tag fell off in about five days. One note, make sure to put it at the very base of the tag. I didn’t it just above and it fell off right where I put the product. I’m excited to keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It works. I've removed a few small miles successfully. I have a very large mole also and I had to treat it twice. It is a scab now. Hopefully will fall off in a couple weeks. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Tracie

customer_reviews.title: Great for Skin Tag Removal
customer_reviews.text: It worked much faster than expected on my son's skin tag. It was on his earlobe and after using this Thursday morning it had completely fallen off by Saturday. We were thrilled not to have to take him in to have it removed. It hasn't worked quite as well on the moles we've used it on since then, but we were happy just to have the skin tag removed.
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I recommend that you follow the directions and you shouldn’t have any issues. I had 2 large moles that this product completely removed within a week. I was about to pay a doctor $500 to cut off just one!! I was worried about pain, but it wasn’t bad, just a stinging feeling. I would do it 100 times over for these results, I was really impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Was not happy with the product. My mole is 3 cm, No where on the insert does it mention how many applications and how to determine how much to use. The mole doubled in size after 1 week of apply the product. Everyone around me were alarmed and suggested that I see a dermatologist. The mole is scabbing slowly. It’s been 1 month, the scab is still on my face. I am cutting off the dry scab so it looks smaller. I was excited to use the product but now after using it I recommend a dermatologist.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never again !!!! Appt at doctor
customer_reviews.text: It burned a whole in my arm now red all around it Fourth day.... by followed instructions...
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Dean

customer_reviews.title: This worked great!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked very well. I assumed I would have to apply it several times but after the first application I could see a change and in just a few days the skin tag was gone. Just a little sting when applying but worth it for the great results.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Brown

customer_reviews.title: Read the Reviews en destrucción
customer_reviews.text: OMG Definitely a good product , Worth the money you pay easy to use and effective my recommendation is to read carefully thanks sessions before use you as my mistake I didn’t read the reviews and I burn my skin do you have to put only on the effect area not in your skin it burns like hell but effective use only a little bit small amount of the product be careful with your skin is touch the product
customer_reviews.author: marisol

customer_reviews.title: it really works
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend it. in two days my skin tags fell off. but I advise you in 2 3 minutes wipe the cream off immediately. the cream is so strong. otherwise it may burn your skin and cause redness.
customer_reviews.author: hansa

product_meta.title: Ariella Mole and Skin Tag Remover and Repair Lotion Set, Remove Moles and Skin Tags
product_meta.description:
Brief Introduction to Ariella Skin Tag Remover and Repair Lotion

Mole Correction and Skin Tag Removal Made Easy 

Simply apply skin tag remover to any unwanted mole or skin tag and watch them quickly disappear! Some see results in as little as one week! 

Powerful, All-Natural Alternative Solution

With our skin tag removal and mole correction cream, you can now remove your unwanted skin tags in the comfort of your own home. 

Works On Moles and Skin Tags On Your Face & Body

No matter where your skin tag may be, Ariella skin tag remover is the low cost effective way to get rid of them. Just pay attention to avoid some body parts, it might be strong for sensitive body parts. 

Let's be honest... As you can see in some reviews below, skin tag remover doesn't work for everyone. But your satisfaction is our top priority, so if you're not happy with the results of our product we don't want your money! Simply send us a message and we will take care from there. 

Safety Warning:

Not meant for use on children under the age of 18. 
Before use, please read all instructions to make sure that the product is used in the correct way. 
The use of skin tag remover cream may cause minor irritation to the skin during the removal process. This is normal however, if you feel you're having an allergic or adverse reaction, stop use immediately and contact us.
Stay clear of your eyes, eyelids, and other mucous membranes.
feature_bullets: NATURAL INGREDIENTS：Our skin tag remover contains an advanced blend of concentrated natural ingredients, Our active ingredient contributes broad spectrum healing properties in our unique lotion formula
FAST & EFFECTIVE: In most cases, skin tags and moles will fall off naturally within 7 - 10 days. We created this formula with the goal of helping people feel & look their best!
SUITABLE FOR FOOT AND BODY -- Our amazing Skin Tag Repair Liquid can be used for almost all skin types and can be used on the foot and body
EASY TO USE: It's specially designed to be easy to use, you can remove skin tags in the privacy of your own home
CONTACT US IF NEEDED: We want you to be satisfied with your purchase, and stand by the quality of our products. Should you for any reason be unhappy with your purchase, please contact us

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
